title: Hi! It's Me, The Viscount's Villanized Daughter
alternative_title: Doumo, Akuyaku ni Sareta Reijou desukedo ; Hello, I'm a Young Lady Who Was Made Into a Villain ; Hi! It's Me, the Viscount's VILLAINIZED DAUGHTER ; Notre jardin secret ; どうも、悪役にされた令嬢ですけれど ; 잘부탁드립니다, 악역으로 몰린 영애입니다만
status: Doumo, Akuyaku ni Sareta Reijou desukedo ; Hello, I'm a Young Lady Who Was Made Into a Villain ; Hi! It's Me, the Viscount's VILLAINIZED DAUGHTER ; Notre jardin secret ; どうも、悪役にされた令嬢ですけれど ; 잘부탁드립니다, 악역으로 몰린 영애입니다만
description:
Description :
        Livia, an otherwise ordinary lady of prestige, save for her unusual blessing, is suddenly made out to be a villain when her engagement is broken off. And though the bad publicity makes it difficult to find a new fiancee, a marquess of higher status named Therion proposes, despite he and Livia's difference in social standing! Shocked, Livia has almost no time to consider the proposal as another problem arises just as quickly as the proposal...! This tale between the perfect nobleman and a lady-turned-villain is a love story you won't want to miss!
